title: Fossil and Evolution
description: Exhibition at the Swedish Museum of Natural History featuring animals and plants that have come and gone during the history of Earth. The museum is closed on Mondays except during holidays and school breaks.

title: The Vasa Museum tour
description: During this tour a guide will take you on a fascinating journey of more than 500 years of Swedish tradition, fashion, art, history and architecture. You will also discover how a ship that spent 333 years on the bottom of the sea can be so...

title: Stockholm Free Tour
description: Free guided walking tours in English and Spanish that take you to the main sites of Stockholm. Tours start daily at 10 am in Gamla Stan and last for about 1 hour and 30 minutes.

title: Champagne at Spritmuseum
description: Welcome to a show about soil types, fermentation, bubbles and many more details of Champagne production, as well as trends and popular culture, such as Champagne’s place in the hip-hop world, its arrival on 1980's Swedish television, and...

title: Magic City - The Art of the Street
description: Magic City - The Art of the Street presents today’s most vital and imaginative art form – Street Art - in all its diversity. It's political, lyrical, biting, critical, and always entertaining. In Magic city the whole...
